overview: Lear Werts LLP is a law firm that is located at 2003 W. Broadway, Ste. 107, Columbia, MO 65203. We specialize in Personal Injury law, Workers Compensation law, Employment law including unpaid wages and overtime benifits, as well as other litigation matters. If you have a case that you would like help with please contact us at 573-875-1991 or visit our website www.learwerts.com.
